#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define gc getchar_unlocked
#define fo(i,n) for(i=0;i<n;i++)
#define Fo(i,k,n) for(i=k;i<n;i++)
#define ll long long
#define pii pair<int,int>
#define vi vector<int>
#define pb push_back
#define mp make_pair
#define mod 1000000007

using namespace std;
void sd(int &x)
{
    register int c = gc();
    x = 0;
    for(;(c<48 || c>57);c = gc());
    for(;c>47 && c<58;c = gc()) {x = (x<<1) + (x<<3) + c - 48;}
}
void sd(ll &x)
{
    register int c = gc();
    x = 0;
    for(;(c<48 || c>57);c = gc());
    for(;c>47 && c<58;c = gc()) {x = (x<<1) + (x<<3) + c - 48;}
}
int Find(int p[],int a)
{
	int n=a;
	int k;
	while(p[a]!=a) a=p[a];
	while(p[n]!=n) k=p[n], p[n]=a, n=k;
	return a;
}
int conn(int p[],int a,int b)
{
	a = Find(p,a);
	b = Find(p,b);
	if(a==b) return 0;
	p[a]=b;
	return 1;
}
int main()
{
	int t;
	sd(t);
	int i,n,c;
	int a,b,Q,s,d;
	while(t--)
	{	
		sd(n); sd(c);
		int p[n];
		fo(i,n) p[i]=i;
		while(c--)
		{
			sd(a); sd(b);
			conn(p,a-1,b-1);
		}
		sd(Q);
		while(Q--)
		{
			sd(s); sd(d);
			if(Find(p,s-1)==Find(p,d-1))
			printf("Yes\n");
			else
			printf("No\n");
		}
	}
	
	return 0;
}
